HeroSection.Title: Kuma mpfuno wa nkoka ni mikateko ya nhlangano
HeroSection.Subtitle: Kambela swikombelo swa ndhawu swa nkoka eka nhlangano wa wena
HeroSection.SupportSubtitle: Hi vafambisi va tikomiti ta xifundzha, minhlangano ya vafana, na swiyimo swa vandla.

Blogs.LatestNews: Mahungu ya sweswinyana mayelana ni switsundzuxo swa ntirho
Blogs.Insight: Kambela ku antswisa vutivi ni mikateko ya ntirho

Footer.Address: 143 West Street, Sandown, Sandton, Gauteng, Afrika Dzonga

Jobs.Title: Kambela Mikateko Ya Switirhisiwa Swa Ntirho
Jobs.Subtitle: Kuma ntirho lowu faneleke na wena hi ntokoto, mali, xifundzha, na rimba

FAQs.Title: Mibvumo Leyi Hlaleriweke
FAQs.Subtitle: Loko swivutiso swa wena swi nga hlamuseriwi laha, nga xihi u tihlanganisa na vatirhisi va hina va ku pfuna.
FAQs.LoadError: Ku tsandzeka ku hlayisa Mibvumo. Hi kombela u ringeta nakambe endzhakunyana.

Events.ExploreEvents: Kambela swihlamariso leswi endliwaka ka ndhawu ya wena
Events.EventsInfo: Tirholo ti endleriwe hi minhlangano, miganga, na tindhawu ta bindzu.

PrivacyPolicy.Title: Nawu wa Vutivi
PrivacyPolicy.Intro: Hi teka nhlamulo wa vutivi bya wena. Hi yona ndlela leyi hi tirhisa yona vutivi bya wena:
PrivacyPolicy.DataCollection: 1. Ku Kumeka Ka Vutivi: Hi hlengeleta vutivi lebyi u byi nyikaka na bya ntolovelo.
PrivacyPolicy.Usage: 2. Vutivi: Hi tirhisa vutivi bya wena ku antswisa switirhisiwa na vutivi.
PrivacyPolicy.Security: 3. Vutivi: Hi endla mitirho ya ku hlayisela vutivi bya wena.
PrivacyPolicy.ThirdParties: 4. Vatswari: Hi nga ku byela handle na ku pfumala ka wena.
PrivacyPolicy.Updates: 5. Nhlamuselo: Ku ka hi nga hundzuluxa nhlawulo hi nkarhi. Ku tirhisa swa vona swi vula ku amukela.
PrivacyPolicy.Contact: Tiyisisa na hina eka info@sisonke.co.za mayelana ni swivutiso.

Subscribe.Title: Tsarisa leswaku u kuma mahungu ya hina
Subscribe.Description: Tiyisisa hi mikateko leyi engeteriweke mayelana ni misebenzi, tirholo, na switirhisiwa.
Subscribe.SuccessMessage: Ku tsarisa ku antswisiwe! Ndza khensa.
Subscribe.ErrorMessage: Ku tsarisa ku tsandzekile. Ringeta nakambe.
Subscribe.ErrorOccurred: Ku hume ku hoxile. Ringeta nakambe.

Services.Title: Leswi u nga swi kuma eka xitichi xa hina
Services.Subtitle: Leswi u nga kotaka ku seketela, mikateko, ni vuxaka
Services.CommunityDescription: Vulavurisana na vanhu va nhlangano hi ku avelana switirhisiwa.
Services.EventsDescription: U nga tshama u ri karhi u kambela mitlangu ya nhlangano.
Services.Jobs: Misebenzi na Ku Va na Rimba
Services.JobsDescription: Minhlangano ya hina yi ku pfuna ku kuma ntirho, dyondzo, na ku hlakulela vutivi.
Services.CommunicationDescription: Hi tirhisa blog na xivandla ku avelana swiyimo, swivutiso, na vuxaka.

Hero.HelpMessage: Loko u lava ku pfuna kumbe u na na xihlovo, hi kona eka wena

ContactPage.FormInstruction: Tsala fomo leyi ku humelerisa swipimelo swo karhi eka xitichi xa hina.
ContactPage.InvalidEmail: Ndzi kombela u tirhisa email yo lulama
ContactPage.ShortMessage: Mulaedza wu fanele ku va wa nhlamulo ya 10 ku ya ehenhla
ContactPage.Name: Vito
ContactPage.Subject: Nhlamuselo

hero.title: Hi Rhandzu
hero.subtitle: E Sisonke, hi ta khoma hi ku tikhoma hi ku tshembha, ku hlangana, na ku kula eka matsalwa ya Afrika Dzonga.

AboutUs.WhoWeAreDescription: Sisonke i xitichi xa vanhu lexi phameriwaka ku lulamisela swikombelo, mikateko, na vanhu hi ku hlanganisa ndhawu.
AboutUs.WhatWeDoDescription: Hi nyika xivandla xa dijithale ku endla bindzu, swikombelo, tirholo na nhlangano.
AboutUs.HowWeHelpDescription: Hi endla vuxaka, ku rhangisa vutivi, na ku nyika mikateko ya ku kula.
AboutUs.CreateSuccessStoriesDescription: Hi ku hlanganisa nhlangano, bindzu na swikombelo swa vanhu, hi pfuna vanhu ku fika swiendlakalo swa vona.

job.findJob: Kuma ntirho lowu faneleke na wena
job.searchPlaceholder: Lavisisa hi vito ra ntirho kumbe khampani
